botMessages.message: Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, I'm Rider, your field service assistant. Ask me anything or get started with an option below. At anytime you can return here by saying MAIN MENU:
Goodbye! Click the "End Chat" button to end this chat

Great! I can help you schedule a new appointment.
What do you need (ie "Battery Replacement", "Site Survey", etc)?
Looks like I couldn't find your contact record. Make sure this messaging user is assigned a contact, and the contact is "Rider Enabled". I'm going to transfer you to an agent, so you can fix this...
{!Contact.FirstName}, I couldn't find any service appointments for you. Don't worry, you can schedule one from this thread, or chat with an agent.
Are you sure you'd like to cancel "{!Appointment.Subject}"?
Below are the next available slots. Choose an option:
When would you like to schedule your Appointment for?
Sorry, but that's not an available time to schedule "{!Appointment.Subject}"
Sorry, there are no slots available. Please try again later or call in to speak with a representative.

This contact is not Rider Enabled. Please ensure "Rider Enabled" field is set on the contact record.
I'm going to transfer you to an agent to fix this...
Sounds good! It's my pleasure to serve you!
